verses.roman:
'tomāra ṭhāñi jāni kichu dravya āchaya'
īśāna kahe,--'mora ṭhāñi sāta mohara haya'

synonyms: tomāra ṭhāñi—in your possession; jāni—I understand; kichu—some; dravya—valuable thing; āchaya—there is; īśāna kahe—Īśāna replied; mora ṭhāñi—in my possession; sāta mohara—seven gold coins; haya—there are.
translation: Sanātana asked his servant,"Īśāna, I think you have some valuable things with you." Īśāna replied,"Yes, I have seven gold coins."
